pullRequest.title: [Enhancement] Add detail msg to show the reason of publish failure.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add 2 new columns PublishTime and ErrMsg to show publish version time and  errors happen during the transaction process. Can be seen by executing:
SHOW PROC "/transactions/dbId/";
or
SHOW TRANSACTION WHERE ID=xx;
Currently is only record error happen in publish phase, which can help us to find out which txn
is blocked.
Fix #3646

nodes.bodyText: What is the different between version and lastSuccessVersion/lastFailedVersion? Why only update lastSuccessVersion/lastFailedVersion but not version when we found replica's lastFailedVersion is larger than 0?
If publishVersionTime will always be updated after finishTransaction failed, is it means that this publish job may keep runnning in doris forever?

commit.message:
[Enhancenment] Add detail msg to show the reason of publish failure.

Add a new column `ErrMsg` to show some errors happen during the transaction
process. Can be seen by executint: `SHOW PROC "/transactions/dbId/"`
